Uses of Interface
com.psddev.dari.db.Database

  • Packages that use Database 
    Package Description
    com.psddev.dari.db  

    • Uses of Database in com.psddev.dari.db

      Classes in com.psddev.dari.db that implement Database 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractDatabase<C>
      Skeletal database implementation.
      class  AggregateDatabase
      Group of databases that acts as one.
      class  CachingDatabase
      Caches the results of read operations.
      class  ForwardingDatabase
      Skeletal database implementation that forwards all calls to another database.
      class  MongoDatabase
      Database backed by MongoDB.
      class  ProfilingDatabase
      Times all database operations using Profiler.
      class  SolrDatabase
      Database backed by a Apache Solr server.
      class  SqlDatabase
      Database backed by a SQL engine.
      class  WebDatabase
      Database backed by web APIs.
